38
Appendix A: Application Requirements
This appendix is an integral part of the ESRS S4 Consumers and end-users. It supports the
application of the requirements set out in this standard and has the same authority as the other parts
of the standard.
Objective
AR 1. The undertaking may highlight special issues relevant to a material impact for a shorter
period of time, for instance initiatives regarding the health and safety of consumers and/or
